Shopify Review Grid Section

Learn how to create a Review Grid section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Review Grid section is designed to display customer reviews in a dynamic and visually appealing grid format. This section can enhance your store by showcasing valuable testimonials, helping to build trust and credibility with potential customers. Each review can be customized with background images, text content, and formatting to match your store’s aesthetics seamlessly.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Review Grid"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Pages: Add the Review Grid section to individual product pages to highlight customer testimonials for that specific item. This can help increase conversions by providing social proof from prior customers.

  2. Homepage: Include a Review Grid on your homepage to give a quick, impactful presentation of what your customers are saying about your store and its products. This can attract new visitors by showing them trusted opinions right away.

  3. Landing Pages: Use the Review Grid on landing pages for special promotions or launches. Displaying relevant customer reviews can bolster the success of your campaigns by instilling confidence in your offerings.

  4. About Us Page: Place a Review Grid on your “About Us” page to reflect the human side of your business, showcasing heartfelt testimonials from happy customers which can reinforce your brand’s reputation.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  • Font

    • Override theme fonts: Option to override the default theme fonts.
    • Text Font: Choose a custom font for the text.

  • Text

    • Text Size: Adjust the size of the text (10px to 50px).
    • Text Line Height: Set the line height for the text.
    • Text Color: Choose the color of the text.

  • Colors

    • Background: Set the background color or gradient for the Review Grid section.
    • Cover Background: Define the background color for the overlay cover.
    • Cover Opacity: Adjust the opacity of the overlay cover (0% to 100%).
    • Highlight Color: Set the highlight color for SVG elements and text.

  • Dimensions

    • Max Width of Section: Specify the maximum width of the section in pixels.
    • Gap Between Reviews: Define the spacing between review items.
    • Padding: Adjust padding on the top, bottom, left, and right of the section.
    • Element Spacing: Set the spacing between different text elements within each review.

  • Media

    • Round Borders on Media: Set the border-radius for media elements for rounded corners (0px to 50px).
    • Subtle Shadow on Media: Enable or disable a subtle shadow effect around media elements.

This configuration gives you the flexibility to tailor the Review Grid section to the specific styling and functional needs of your store. Each setting can be adjusted through the Shopify customizer, ensuring that the section complements your overall store design and enhances the shopping experience for your customers.
